ProjectTitle: Paternal Origins of Health and Disease (POHaD)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/07/2023
Data: please list the different data types that you will reuse, collect and/or generate in different rows. Will you also collect physical data such as samples, if yes, how will these be stored? Will you transfer data to the USA, if yes is this approved by the ethical committee? 
Documentation: you can always contact rdm@kuleuven.be to make an appointment with a disciplinary expert to discuss which metadata to use 
Sharing: you can consider using a repository such as KU Leuven RDR for data preservation and sharing, access can be restricted here if needed to protect the privacy of the participants, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr and www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
